text: Naina Iosifovna Yeltsina (, n√©e Girina, ; born 14 March 1932) is the widow of the first President of the Russian Federation, Boris Yeltsin. Yeltsina was rarely seen in public. She accompanied her husband on some of his foreign visits, including 1997 visits to Sweden, Finland,Visitors to Finland and a 1999 visit to China.Russian President Leaves Beijing for Home As a rule, Naina Yeltsina never interfered in her husband's political work. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Russia Category:People from Moscow
title: Naina Yeltsina
